page.title: 04Law and Order-Featherstone
page.content: The Featherstone area is policed by officers of Pontefract sub-divisional area and is patrolled 24hours a day by uniformed officers who deal with emergancy calls immediately and refer other matters for the attention of the Community Constables.The nearest police station is at Pontefract. The main crimes are:- 1 Burglary at schools,shops and garages 2 Petty theft from all types of property 3 Vandalism 4Taking motor vehicles without consent Prior to 1973 there was a fully manned police station on Wakefield Road.This became a part time station but is now closed and premises are for sale.All effort is made to patrol the area on foot on a see and be seen basis as a method of preventing crime.
